DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long-term safety and efficacy of imidafenacin.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Safety and Efficacy of Imidafenacin in Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Men and Woman equal or > 20 years old Patients with urgency, urinary frequency and urgency incontinence Patients with genuine stress incontinence Patients suffering from complications such as bladder tumor, urinary tract stone and symptomatic urinary tract infection Patients suffering from complications contraindicating the use of antimuscarinic medication Patients with polyuria
